chunk: Oil (Organic Suflower), Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethyl Sulfone (MSM), Stearic Acid, Kosher Vegetable Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter (Organic Shea), Simmondsia Chinesis Oil (Organic Jojoba), Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Tocopherol Acetate, Camelia Sinensis Extract (Green Tea), Xanthane Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin
